item.title: 奥卡多加拿大合作伙伴Sobeys关闭仓库，遭遇新挫折
item.description: 奥卡多集团的加拿大合作伙伴将关闭其位于卡尔加里的自动化仓库，原因是阿尔伯塔地区增长低于预期，这是这家英国在线杂货配送公司遭遇的最新挫折。【原文：Ocado Group Plc’s Canadian partner will close its automated warehouse in Calgary due to slower-than-expected growth in the Alberta area, the latest setback for the British online grocery delivery company.】

item.title: 美国放宽关税后，瑞士手表出口重现增长
item.description: 在关税政策放宽后，瑞士手表品牌争相向美国市场发运库存，使该国手表出口在连续四个月下滑后重现增长态势。【原文：Swiss watch exports returned to growth after four months of declines as brands rushed to send inventory to the US after it eased tariffs.】

item.title: 债券投资者担忧法国预算缓解只是昙花一现
item.description: 法国今年在控制预算赤字方面取得的进展未能打动部分债券投资者，他们认为财政恶化的风险只是被推迟了。【原文：France’s progress this year in reining in its budget deficit has failed to impress some bond investors, who say the risk of fiscal deterioration has just been pushed down the road.】

item.title: 印尼股市因监管机构流通股计划收窄跌幅
item.description: 印尼股市收复大部分跌幅，此前监管机构表示计划将最低流通股要求提高一倍，且其主权财富基金丹纳塔拉可能积极参与市场。【原文：Indonesian equities pared most of their losses after regulators said they plan to double the minimum free-float requirements and that its sovereign wealth fund Danantara may actively participate in the market.】

item.title: 土耳其股市有望创1997年以来最佳1月表现，投资者蜂拥而入
item.description: 土耳其股市有望创下29年来最佳1月表现，新兴市场乐观情绪与低估值吸引外国投资者重返市场。【原文：Turkish stocks are poised for their best January in 29 years as the wave of optimism around emerging markets and cheap valuations lure foreign investors back into the market.】

item.title: 茅台领涨白酒股，节日需求推升股价
item.description: 贵州茅台股价创逾一年最大涨幅，因农历新年假期前夕市场看好这家中国白酒巨头的需求增长前景。【原文：Kweichow Moutai Co. shares surged the most in more than a year amid optimism over growing demand for the Chinese distiller ahead of the Lunar New Year holidays.】

item.title: 三菱电机支持初创企业进军人工智能工厂机器人领域
item.description: 三菱电机公司正支持建筑科技初创企业Akari Inc.，这是整个行业为实现工厂全面自动化、训练机器人应对不同情境而寻求技术支持的最新举措。【原文：Mitsubishi Electric Corp. is backing construction-tech startup Akari Inc., the latest in a sector-wide quest for knowhow to fully automate factories and train robots to react to different situations.】

item.title: 2025年瑞士对美出口创历史新高，逆特朗普关税而上
item.description: 2025年，瑞士对美国出口商品创下历史新高，这发生在特朗普总统对瑞士征收最高关税的时期。【原文：Switzerland exported a record amount of goods to the US in 2025, defying a period when President Donald Trump inflicted some of his highest tariffs on the country.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官称中国政府尚未批准H200进口
item.description: 英伟达公司首席执行官表示，该公司尚未收到中国客户对其H200人工智能芯片的任何订单，因为北京方面仍在决定是否允许进口这家美国公司的芯片产品。【原文：Nvidia Corp. hasn’t yet received any orders from Chinese customers for its H200 AI chips as Beijing is still deciding whether to allow imports of the US firm’s components, according to its chief executive officer.】

item.title: 印度削减对俄石油依赖，信实集团计划降低俄罗斯原油进口量
item.description: 知情人士透露，信实工业公司本月首次暂停自2022年以来从俄罗斯进口原油，但将从2月起每日采购约15万桶原油，同时继续从莫斯科未受制裁的生产商处进行有限采购。【原文：Reliance Industries Ltd., which paused Russian crude imports this month for the first time since 2022, will take around 150,000 barrels a day from February as it presses ahead with limited purchases from Moscow’s non-sanctioned producers, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英镑走强，美元走弱，富时指数有望上涨
印度乐观预期显示经济增速可达7.2%
item.description: 印度政府预测，在即将到来的财政年度，该国经济增速将高达7.2%，在全球贸易不确定性加剧之际，这一预测展现出乐观前景。【原文：India’s government predicted the economy will expand as much as 7.2% in the coming financial year, offering an optimistic outlook at a time of heightened uncertainty for global trade.】

item.title: 丹纳塔拉公司以爱国债券两倍成本获得10亿美元贷款
item.description: 知情人士透露，印尼主权财富基金丹纳塔拉已获得相当于10亿美元的贷款，其支付的资金成本是所谓爱国债券的两倍多。【原文：Indonesian sovereign wealth fund Danantara has secured a loan equivalent to $1 billion, people familiar with the matter said, paying more than double for the money than it did with its so-called patriot bonds.】

item.title: 道达尔重启200亿美元莫桑比克计划，Noticias报道
item.description: 据《Noticias》报道，道达尔能源公司正式重启其200亿美元的莫桑比克液化天然气项目。该项目因与伊斯兰国有关的暴力活动而被冻结近五年。【原文：TotalEnergies SE is formally restarting the $20 billion Mozambique LNG project it froze almost five years ago because of Islamic State-linked violence, Noticias reported.】

item.title: 莫迪宣布欧盟贸易协定与改革计划，美印协议仍遥遥无期
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉·莫迪表示，印度与欧盟达成的自由贸易协定为该国制造商提供了进入大型市场的零关税通道，有助于在全球范围内树立印度品牌。【原文：India’s free trade deal with the European Union offers the nation’s manufacturers duty-free access to a large market, helping them establish the country’s brand globally, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said.】

item.title: 意法半导体销售展望因芯片复苏超出预期
item.description: 意法半导体公司（STMicroelectronics NV）作为特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.）和苹果公司（Apple Inc.）的芯片供应商，在去年年底消费电子客户需求显现复苏迹象后，其第一季度营收预测超出分析师预期。【原文：STMicroelectronics NV, a chip supplier for Tesla Inc. and Apple Inc., forecast first-quarter revenue that beat analysts’ estimates after demand from consumer electronics customers showed signs of recovery at the end of last year.】

item.title: 德意志银行计划启动新一轮股票回购，但财报因突袭事件蒙上阴影
item.description: 德意志银行集团以创纪录的年度利润收官，交易收入显著增长，并宣布启动新一轮股票回购计划。该行法兰克福办公室遭突击搜查次日，这一利好消息为首席执行官克里斯蒂安·索伊宁注入了强心剂。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG closed out a record year for profit with higher trading income and announced a new share buyback, in a boost to Chief Executive Officer Christian Sewing a day after a raid on the lender’s Frankfurt offices.】

item.title: 印度黄金进口量将因高价冲击珠宝需求而下降
item.description: 世界黄金协会称，由于金价创下历史新高，作为仅次于中国的全球第二大黄金市场，印度今年黄金进口量预计将下降，珠宝需求受到抑制。【原文：India’s gold imports are expected to fall this year as record prices crimp demand for jewelry in the world’s second-largest bullion market after China, according to the World Gold Council.】

item.title: 北欧联合银行第四季度贷款收入符合预期
item.description: 北欧银行（Nordea Bank Abp）公布的第四季度贷款利润符合市场预期。【原文：Nordea Bank Abp reported fourth-quarter profit from lending that was in line with estimates in the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 中国跨境投资计划收紧，此前需求激增
item.description: 知情人士称，中国已收紧跨境投资计划，限制全球基金经理为内地客户配置资金的范围，此举可能抑制资金流入美国等热门市场。【原文：China has tightened a cross-border investment program to limit where global managers can allocate funds for mainland clients, a move that potentially curbs capital going into popular markets like the US, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国解除制裁后，波斯尼亚塞族重返债券市场
item.description: 据巴尔干半岛国家波黑自治实体财政部长透露，塞族控制的波黑塞族共和国正筹备发行首期欧元债券。此前该地区领导层更迭促使美国解除制裁。【原文：Republika Srpska, the Serb-run half of Bosnia-Herzegovina, is preparing its first eurobond since a change in leadership led to the lifting of US sanctions, according to the finance minister of the Balkan country’s autonomous entity.】

item.title: SEB贷款利润符合预期，手续费抵消低利率影响
item.description: 瑞典银行SEB AB公布的第四季度贷款利润符合预期，因手续费和佣金业务抵消了利率下降的影响。【原文：Swedish lender SEB AB reported profit from lending in the fourth quarter that was in line with estimates as fee and commission business helped offset the impact of lower interest rates.】

item.title: 美元再度下跌，贬值担忧盖过贝森特提振效应
item.description: 美元汇率下跌，终结了周三的反弹势头，因所谓贬值交易的回归盖过了财政部长斯科特·贝森特对强势美元政策的重申。【原文：The dollar fell, halting Wednesday’s bounce, as the return of the so-called debasement trade outweighed Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent’s affirmation of the strong-greenback policy.】

item.title: 爱德万测试日经225权重下调在即，此前股价已上涨15%
item.description: 日本日经225指数可能下调爱德万测试公司的权重，这可能引发被动卖盘，因指数基金将进行权重调整。【原文：A potential cut to Advantest Corp.’s weighting in Japan’s Nikkei 225 Stock Average could drive passive selling as index funds rebalance.】

item.title: SAP预测2026年云收入将实现增长，因客户正转向云服务
item.description: SAP SE预测，随着客户在停止服务旧版客户的截止日期前逐步淘汰旧技术，其云业务收入将在2026年实现增长。【原文：SAP SE forecast cloud revenue will grow in 2026 as customers shift from older technology ahead of a deadline to stop servicing legacy clients.】

item.title: 中国多地下调GDP目标，全国目标或将下调
item.description: 十余个中国省份下调了2026年经济增长目标，这预示着全国经济增长目标可能在四年内首次下调。【原文：Over a dozen Chinese provinces have reduced their economic growth targets for 2026, pointing to a likely downgrade of the national goal for the first time in four years.】

item.title: 曼彻斯特展现英国经济复苏的可能图景
item.description: “他们当时觉得这不过是一群狂妄的曼彻斯特人在胡说八道，”前英国财政部部长、高盛首席经济学家吉姆·奥尼尔表示。 "但随着时间推移，证据日益清晰，他们开始惊呼'天啊'。"奥尼尔所指的是大曼彻斯特地区——其经济增速是英国全国平均水平的两倍。该地区吸引了首都以外最高的外国直接投资，成功引入IBM、Booking.com、Klarna、博世、Roku等全球企业。【原文：“They just thought it was a bunch of cocky Mancunians talking bullshit,” says Jim O’Neill, the former Treasury minister and Goldman Sachs chief economist. “But the more time goes on and the more the evidence becomes clear, they’re like, ‘Oh my God.’”O’Neill is talking about Greater Manchester, whose economy has been growing at twice the UK’s national rate. It’s attracted the highest foreign direct investment outside the capital, drawing global companies like IBM, Booking.com, Klarna, Bosch, Roku】

item.title: 英格兰银行考虑出售温网资格赛场地
item.description: 英国央行正计划重启伦敦某体育俱乐部的出售事宜，该俱乐部协助承办年度温布尔登网球锦标赛。此举是央行全面削减成本举措的一部分。【原文：The Bank of England is looking to restart the sale of a London sports club that helps host the annual Wimbledon tennis tournament, amid a wide-ranging push to slash its costs.】

item.title: 克里姆林宫的战争机器将在更严格的预算下踩下刹车
item.description: 俄罗斯国防工业今年将大幅放缓，因为克里姆林宫选择优先保障经济稳定和财政平衡，而非继续增加对乌克兰战争的开支。【原文：Russia’s defense industry is poised to slow sharply this year as the Kremlin opts to prioritize economic stability and balancing finances over further increases in spending on the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 高盛称必和必拓与CMRG纠纷恐致20亿美元损失
item.description: 高盛集团表示，在中國限制其金伯利铁矿石进口后，必和必拓集团可能面临高达20亿美元的定价压力冲击，因折扣扩大且块矿溢价暴跌。【原文：BHP Group could face up to $2 billion hit from pricing pressures after China restricted its Jimblebar iron ore, as discounts widen and lump premiums collapse, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】
